pages.text: $(li)Every time when you receive damage from another creature, the Healer's Pouch gives you the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/regeneration)Regeneration$(/l) effect, regenerating your life, and the Panic effect, increasing your walking movement.$(br)$(li)Both effects have a coldown of a few seconds.

pages.name: Healer's Pouch
pages.text: The Healer's Pouch effects can be upgraded by receiving damage for other creatures.
